commit message: Fix crash when rotating on the voice list preference
Format the voice languages in the list preference
Add a custom VoicePreference for the list of tts voices
Add a setting 'system voice' as the default voice setting.
Added proguard rules and about screen entries for retrolambda and streamsupport.
Fix crash when using another tts engine
Update to the gradle plugin 2.1.2.  Also add workaround for 'stop' button in reader fragment.
Fix bug where the user switches TTS engines and their selected voice is no longer available.
